title: Championship Weekend Review & Super Bowl Preview (Football 01/21)
description:
Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco, Jason La Canfora and Will Brinson break down the AFC & NFC Championship games, start talking about Super Bowl weekend and tackle the latest in coaching news around the NFL. First, the guys talk about what went right for the Pats and Eagles and what went wrong for the Jaguars and Vikings. Next, they discuss what's next for the championship weekend losers and how the Super Bowl looks. Finally, they look at the latest in coaching talks around the league and what teams will look like with new faces at the helm.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
